abstract: Charter Communications said Thursday that a bankruptcy judge planned to approve its pre-arranged reorganization plan, which is the last step before the company can emerge from court protection.
snippet: Charter Communications said Thursday that a bankruptcy judge planned to approve its pre-arranged reorganization plan, which is the last step before the company can emerge from court protection.
lead_paragraph: Charter Communications said Thursday that a bankruptcy judge planned to approve its prearranged reorganization plan, which is the last step before the company can emerge from court protection, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Charter Says Judge Is Near Approval of Reorganization Plan
